text:
Haven't had Swensen's in a very long while. Brought my family here because I had a voucher. Overall, food was okay and acceptable. The mala pasta was the nicest out of all the dishes we ordered. It was tasty and spicy. The ice cream was good, mint was our favourite flavour.

The service was a little slow, considering that there were very minimal customers that day and timing that we visited. We weren't attended to while queueing outside. We had to walk-in and find seats ourselves to get noticed by the staff.

A sweet treat to start the week right! ü´∂üèª
Took my mum out for some quality time and we couldn‚Äôt resist this amazing 1-for-1 Senior Special on selected sundaes @SwensensSingapore! Available from 2pm to 4.30pm (Monday to Friday), it‚Äôs the perfect way to enjoy a little indulgence without breaking the bank. üç¶üíï
I would all are delicious except for the waffles. I was expecting it to be crispy and fragrant not soggy type. Overall a good dining experience. Good for small group.

Ordered via Grab app, from Swensen Jurong Point and this is what we get??? What are paying for??? HALF THE AMOUNT FOR THE ICE CREAM?? Melted Sticky Chewy Choc Milkshake comes in half!??? And its not even Sticky Chewy Milkshake its Choc Milkshake only after we took a sip of it!!! What is this????

Food was nice, staff able to explain waiting/cooking times and food ran out and able to replace the chocolate fondue with other food items due to peak hours.

Not sure about the other reviews talking about seat having bugs, food not cooked properly so you have to dine there and judge by your own judgement.
